title: Portfolio
text:
Portfolio





Elevate your data with visuals that captivate and communicate. Whether you need striking graphics, custom reporting tools, or seamless back-end solutions, discover a range of services designed to turn your data into compelling stories and functional insights.






Captivating visuals

Engaging graphics with compelling narratives, crafted directly from the data.

title: Let visuals simplify your data story.
text:
Let visuals simplify your data story.


Creating compelling data visuals that transform complex information into clear, actionable insights. From dynamic dashboards to custom ad-hoc visuals and reporting templates, I deliver solutions that make it easy for audiences to understand their data, empowering informed decisions and driving impactful results.

 Get in touch

title: Ford Johnson
text:
GitHub
  
  
    
     LinkedIn
  

  
  


Hey there, I’m Ford, a data analyst and storyteller with experience navigating the intersection of web analytics and big data. I’m skilled at untangling complex datasets to find useful insights and telling engaging stories with the data.
Beyond the digital realm, you’ll often find me exploring the great outdoors, capturing moments through the lens of my camera, or embarking on hiking adventures.
Feel free to explore my work on this site, where I share insights, projects, and a glimpse into my data journey.

title: Notes
text:
Notes





A collection of data notes from my learning journey and mini analysis projects. These entries cover various techniques, insights, and findings to aid in understanding and experimentation.






General notes

Just a placeholder category to build out my notes.




  
    
      
        Distance squared sum
         
        
          
        
        
        Represents the Euclidean distance between two sets of values, calculated as the square root of the sum of squared differences.
      
    
    
      
    
    
    
    
  

  
    
      
        Matchmaking in Rocket League
         
        
          
        
        
        An exploration of matchmaking in competitive Rocket League, covering Root Mean Square (RMS) skill calculations, party matchmaking, and rating updates.
